snippet.title: Are you ready to HUNT MONSTERS? | mo.co
snippet.description:
The time is NOW! 👾😼
Download mo.co and look up #joinmoco to grab an invite!

Twitter/X: https://x.com/joinmoco
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/joinmoco/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@joinmoco
Discord: https://discord.gg/moco
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/joinmoco/

Are you ready for the part-time adventure of a lifetime? 

mo.co is recruiting hunters to help us fight back against Chaos Monsters from parallel worlds who started invading Earth! No experience necessary. Flexible hours. Fun team environment.

Job responsibilities:

Hunt Chaos Monsters… They keep attacking everything!
Take down bosses..  We’re a company but we don’t like bosses. 
Test & Upgrade Gear… Find the best combinations of Weapons, Gadgets, and Passives.
Collect Chaos Shards.. Fuel our R&D by gathering these bits of Chaos Energy.

Start your monster hunting career at mo.co to experience a working environment that is….

FLEXIBLE  - Bite sized adventures that fit into your schedule. 
FASHIONABLE - At mo.co, our mission is to ‘Hunt Monsters with Style.’ 
REWARDING - Unlock Weapons, Gadgets, and Passives! 
COLLABORATIVE - Hunt with others to defeat big bosses and monster hoards. 
CHALLENGING - Overcome challenging challenges that challenge you! 
COMPETITIVE - Compete against other hunters to prove your skills!
 
#joinmoco
